name: react-flyd-class
description: create reactive react classes for flyd streams

scripts.build:umd: webpack src/index.js dist/react-flyd-class.js --display-modules --progress && NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/react-flyd-class.min.js --display-modules --progress
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-examples: npm run build:umd; for i in `ls examples`; do pushd examples/$i; webpack; popd; done

author: Adam Nalisnick
